-*- coding: utf-8 -*- """ è¶…å¿«é€ŸRTPæµæå–å·¥å…· ç›´æ¥å¤„ç†åŸå§‹å­—èŠ‚ï¼Œé¿å…Scapyå®Œæ•´è§£æ """ import os import struct import wave from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor from collections import defaultdict import threading PCAP_FILE = "Data.pcap" OUTPUT_DIR = "rtp_audio" NUM_THREADS = 32 # åˆ›å»ºè¾“å‡ºç›®å½• os.makedirs(OUTPUT_DIR, exist_ok=True) # G.711 Î¼-law è§£ç è¡¨ï¼ˆé¢„å…ˆæ„å»ºï¼‰ MULAW_TABLE = [] for i in range(256): mulaw = ~i & 0xFF sign = -1 if (mulaw & 0x80) else 1 exponent = (mulaw & 0x70) >> 4 mantissa = mulaw & 0x0F magnitude = ((mantissa << 3) + 0x84) << exponent magnitude = magnitude - 0x84 MULAW_TABLE.append(sign * magnitude) def decode_mulaw_fast(data): """å¿«é€Ÿè§£ç  Î¼-law""" result = bytearray(len(data) * 2) for i, byte in enumerate(data): pcm_value = MULAW_TABLE[byte] struct.pack_into('<h', result, i * 2, pcm_value) return bytes(result) def read_pcap_raw(filename): """å¿«é€Ÿè¯»å–pcapæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåªæå–UDPåŒ…çš„åŸå§‹æ•°æ®""" packets = [] with open(filename, 'rb') as f: # è¯»å–å…¨å±€å¤´ï¼ˆ24å­—èŠ‚ï¼‰ global_header = f.read(24) if len(global_header) < 24: return packets magic = struct.unpack('<I', global_header[0:4])[0] if magic == 0xa1b2c3d4: endian = '<' elif magic == 0xd4c3b2a1: endian = '>' else: print("ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„pcapæ ¼å¼") return packets count = 0 while True: # è¯»å–åŒ…å¤´ï¼ˆ16å­—èŠ‚ï¼‰ packet_header = f.read(16) if len(packet_header) < 16: break ts_sec, ts_usec, incl_len, orig_len = struct.unpack(f'{endian}IIII', packet_header) # è¯»å–åŒ…æ•°æ® packet_data = f.read(incl_len) if len(packet_data) < incl_len: break count += 1 if count % 100000 == 0: print(f"[*] å·²è¯»å– {count} ä¸ªåŒ…...") packets.append(packet_data) return packets def parse_ethernet_ip_udp(raw_data): """å¿«é€Ÿè§£æä»¥å¤ªç½‘/IP/UDPåŒ…""" try: # ä»¥å¤ªç½‘å¤´ï¼ˆ14å­—èŠ‚ï¼‰ if len(raw_data) < 14: return None eth_type = struct.unpack('!H', raw_data[12:14])[0] # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯IPåŒ…ï¼ˆ0x0800ï¼‰ if eth_type != 0x0800: return None # IPå¤´ï¼ˆæœ€å°20å­—èŠ‚ï¼‰ if len(raw_data) < 34: return None ip_start = 14 ip_header_len = (raw_data[ip_start] & 0x0F) * 4 ip_protocol = raw_data[ip_start + 9] # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯UDPï¼ˆ17ï¼‰ if ip_protocol != 17: return None src_ip = '.'.join(str(b) for b in raw_data[ip_start+12:ip_start+16]) dst_ip = '.'.join(str(b) for b in raw_data[ip_start+16:ip_start+20]) # UDPå¤´ï¼ˆ8å­—èŠ‚ï¼‰ udp_start = ip_start + ip_header_len if len(raw_data) < udp_start + 8: return None src_port = struct.unpack('!H', raw_data[udp_start:udp_start+2])[0] dst_port = struct.unpack('!H', raw_data[udp_start+2:udp_start+4])[0] udp_len = struct.unpack('!H', raw_data[udp_start+4:udp_start+6])[0] # UDP payload payload_start = udp_start + 8 udp_payload = raw_data[payload_start:payload_start + udp_len - 8] return { 'src_ip': src_ip, 'dst_ip': dst_ip, 'src_port': src_port, 'dst_port': dst_port, 'payload': udp_payload } except: return None def parse_rtp(udp_payload): """å¿«é€Ÿè§£æRTPåŒ…""" try: if len(udp_payload) < 12: return None # æ£€æŸ¥ç‰ˆæœ¬å· version = (udp_payload[0] >> 6) & 0x03 if version != 2: return None padding = (udp_payload[0] >> 5) & 0x01 csrc_count = udp_payload[0] & 0x0F payload_type = udp_payload[1] & 0x7F sequence = struct.unpack('!H', udp_payload[2:4])[0] timestamp = struct.unpack('!I', udp_payload[4:8])[0] ssrc = struct.unpack('!I', udp_payload[8:12])[0] # æå–payload header_len = 12 + (4 * csrc_count) if len(udp_payload) < header_len: return None payload = udp_payload[header_len:] # ç§»é™¤padding if padding and len(payload) > 0: padding_len = payload[-1] if padding_len <= len(payload): payload = payload[:-padding_len] return { 'ssrc': ssrc, 'sequence': sequence, 'timestamp': timestamp, 'payload_type': payload_type, 'payload': payload } except: return None # å…¨å±€è®¡æ•°å™¨ processed_counter = 0 rtp_counter = 0 counter_lock = threading.Lock() def process_packet_batch(args): """å¤„ç†ä¸€æ‰¹æ•°æ®åŒ…""" batch_id, packets_batch = args global processed_counter, rtp_counter local_streams = defaultdict(lambda: { 'packets': [], 'payload_type': None, 'src_ip': None, 'dst_ip': None, 'src_port': None, 'dst_port': None }) local_rtp_count = 0 for raw_packet in packets_batch: # è§£æUDPåŒ… udp_info = parse_ethernet_ip_udp(raw_packet) if not udp_info: continue # è§£æRTP rtp_info = parse_rtp(udp_info['payload']) if not rtp_info: continue local_rtp_count += 1 ssrc = rtp_info['ssrc'] # è®°å½•æµä¿¡æ¯ if local_streams[ssrc]['payload_type'] is None: local_streams[ssrc]['payload_type'] = rtp_info['payload_type'] local_streams[ssrc]['src_ip'] = udp_info['src_ip'] local_streams[ssrc]['dst_ip'] = udp_info['dst_ip'] local_streams[ssrc]['src_port'] = udp_info['src_port'] local_streams[ssrc]['dst_port'] = udp_info['dst_port'] local_streams[ssrc]['packets'].append({ 'sequence': rtp_info['sequence'], 'timestamp': rtp_info['timestamp'], 'payload': rtp_info['payload'] }) # æ›´æ–°å…¨å±€è®¡æ•°å™¨ with counter_lock: processed_counter += len(packets_batch) rtp_counter += local_rtp_count if processed_counter % 100000 < len(packets_batch): print(f"[*] å·²å¤„ç† {processed_counter} ä¸ªåŒ…, æ‰¾åˆ° {rtp_counter} ä¸ªRTPåŒ…...") return dict(local_streams) def merge_streams(all_results): """åˆå¹¶æ‰€æœ‰çº¿ç¨‹çš„ç»“æœ""" merged = defaultdict(lambda: { 'packets': [], 'payload_type': None, 'src_ip': None, 'dst_ip': None, 'src_port': None, 'dst_port': None }) for result in all_results: for ssrc, stream_data in result.items(): if merged[ssrc]['payload_type'] is None: merged[ssrc]['payload_type'] = stream_data['payload_type'] merged[ssrc]['src_ip'] = stream_data['src_ip'] merged[ssrc]['dst_ip'] = stream_data['dst_ip'] merged[ssrc]['src_port'] = stream_data['src_port'] merged[ssrc]['dst_port'] = stream_data['dst_port'] merged[ssrc]['packets'].extend(stream_data['packets']) return dict(merged) def main(): global processed_counter, rtp_counter print(f"[+] æ­£åœ¨å¿«é€Ÿè¯»å– {PCAP_FILE}...") packets = read_pcap_raw(PCAP_FILE) total_packets = len(packets) print(f"[+] å·²è¯»å– {total_packets} ä¸ªæ•°æ®åŒ…åˆ°å†…å­˜") print(f"[+] ä½¿ç”¨ {NUM_THREADS} ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹å¹¶è¡Œå¤„ç†") # å°†æ•°æ®åŒ…åˆ†æ‰¹ batch_size = (total_packets + NUM_THREADS - 1) // NUM_THREADS batches = [(i, packets[i:i + batch_size]) for i in range(0, total_packets, batch_size)] print(f"[+] åˆ†æˆ {len(batches)} æ‰¹ï¼Œæ¯æ‰¹çº¦ {batch_size} ä¸ªåŒ…") print(f"[+] å¼€å§‹å¹¶è¡Œå¤„ç†...") # é‡ç½®è®¡æ•°å™¨ processed_counter = 0 rtp_counter = 0 # å¤šçº¿ç¨‹å¤„ç† results = [] with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=NUM_THREADS) as executor: futures = [executor.submit(process_packet_batch, batch) for batch in batches] for future in futures: results.append(future.result()) print(f"[+] åˆå¹¶ç»“æœ...") streams = merge_streams(results) print(f"\n[+] å¤„ç†å®Œæˆ!") print(f"[+] æ€»æ•°æ®åŒ…: {total_packets}") print(f"[+] RTPæ•°æ®åŒ…: {rtp_counter}") print(f"[+] è¯†åˆ«å‡º {len(streams)} ä¸ªRTPæµ\n") # ä¿å­˜æ¯ä¸ªæµ for idx, (ssrc, stream_data) in enumerate(streams.items(), 1): packets_list = stream_data['packets'] payload_type = stream_data['payload_type'] # æŒ‰åºåˆ—å·æ’åº packets_list.sort(key=lambda x: x['sequence']) print(f"æµ #{idx} - SSRC: 0x{ssrc:08X}") print(f" æ•°æ®åŒ…æ•°: {len(packets_list)}") print(f" Payload Type: {payload_type}") print(f" {stream_data['src_ip']}:{stream_data['src_port']} -> " f"{stream_data['dst_ip']}:{stream_data['dst_port']}") # ç¡®å®šç¼–ç  if payload_type == 0: codec = "G.711 Î¼-law (PCMU)" needs_decode = True elif payload_type == 8: codec = "G.711 A-law (PCMA)" needs_decode = True else: codec = f"æœªçŸ¥ (PT={payload_type})" needs_decode = False print(f" ç¼–ç : {codec}") # åˆå¹¶payload raw_data = b''.join(p['payload'] for p in packets_list) # ä¿å­˜åŸå§‹æ•°æ® raw_file = os.path.join(OUTPUT_DIR, f"stream_{idx}_{ssrc:08X}.raw") with open(raw_file, 'wb') as f: f.write(raw_data) print(f" åŸå§‹æ–‡ä»¶: {raw_file} ({len(raw_data)} å­—èŠ‚)") #
